title: Rewriting Monday
description: From New York Times bestselling author Jodi Thomas comes a suspenseful romance about woman seeking a second chance at life and love. Reporter Pepper Malone moved to Bailey, Texas, after a news story nearly got her killed. Now she wants to be left alone to do her job in relative peace and quiet. But when the newspaper’s staff is targeted by a madman with a grudge against the media, Pepper is drawn back into the public eye—and into the arms of the paper’s handsome owner.
author: Jodi Thomas
